replies.msg:
你個dynamic programming approach work 啊，不過 你個a_0 = 1 not 7 ,我可以elaborate 少少，
let d_n = all combination with last char 1 or 2.
b_n = all combination with last char not 1 and 2.
We have:
d_{n+1}= 2 d_n + 2 b_n
b_{n+1} = 2 d_n + 5 b_n.

We want to find a_n = d_n + b_n.

Let M = mat[2, 2 ; 2, 5]. v_n = mat[d_n; b_n]. v_1 = mat[2;5]. we can rewrite the equation as:
v_{n+1} = M v_n.
M = V^-1 diag(1,6) V. V = mat[-2, 1; 1, 2].
v_n = V^-1 diag(1,6^(n-1)) V v_1.

v_n =1/5 mat[-2 + 2*6^n; 1 + 4*6^n].
a_n =v_n \dot [1,1] = (6*6^n -1)/5.

replies.msg: 我做緊part 2. d_n, b_n 有埋condition " The characters "a", "b" and "c" do not come after the digit "1" or "2".".

原來DSE有呢d counting問題

part (b)一般應該係理解做(i) 1/2出現左之後就唔可以再有a/b/c (唔必一定係連住)
有d巴打理解做(ii) a/b/c唔可以come "immediately" after
你最好問清楚係邊個case

Case (i)既話
你可以conditioning on 1/2幾時第一次出現係咩位置
可以係1, 2, ..., n = 10或者冇出現過
上面n+1個case都係mutually exclusive
所以唔洗擔心會數左重覆
如果1/2第1次出現係i-th position for i <= n
咁前i-1個位每個有5個choice (唔可以係1/2, 因為第一次出現係第i-th個位)
第i個位有2個choice (1 or 2)
i+1, ..., n每個有4個choice (因為唔可以係a/b/c)

最後如果1/2冇出現過, 咁有5^n個combination

所以total會係
2(5^0*4^{n-1} + 5^1*4^{n-2} + ... + 5^{n-1}*4^0) + 5^n
或者
5^n + 2\sum_{i = 0}^{n-1} 5^i*4^{n-1-i}

後面個summation係geometric sum, 可以simplify:
\sum_{i = 0}^{n-1} 5^i*4^{n-1-i}
= 4^{n-1}\sum_{i = 0}^{n-1} (5/4)^i
= 4^{n-1}[(5/4)^n - 1]/[(5/4)-1]
= 4^n[(5/4)^n-1]
= 5^n - 4^n

closed-form solution係
3*5^n - 2*4^n



Case (ii)既話
有幾個方法可以做
可以complementary counting+inclusion-exclusion：count有幾多個string contains (1/2, a/b/c) pairs
之後用inclusion-exclusion (唔太depends on n, 主要depends on 有幾多個(1/2, a/b/c) pairs, which is 6)
或者搵recurrence relation之後solve左佢

inclusion-exclusion既話: let A_1, A_2, B_1, B_2, C_1, C_2 be sets of strings that contain (1,a), (2,a), (1,b), (2,b), (1,c) and (2,c) respectively
你想count |A_1 or A_2 or ... or C_2| = 6|A_1| - C(6,2)|A_1 or A_2| + C(6,3)|A_1 or A_2 or B_1| - C(6,4)|A_1 or A_2 or B_1 or B_2| + C(6,5)|A_1 or A_2 or B_1 or B_2 or C_1| - C(6,6)|A_1 or ... or C_2|

recurrence relation既話: 同上面一有人講既差唔多
不過寫做system既既要做spectral decomposition先搵到closed-form solution (或者你估個closed-form再用induction証)
例如用返上面個巴打個recurrence relation:
a_n = 2a_{n-1}+2b_{n-1}
b_n = 2a_{n-1}+5b_{n-1}
你搵matrix [2 2; 2 5]既eigenvalues, which are 6 and 1
咁個closed-form solution for c_n := a_n+b_n一定係of the form
A*6^n+B*1^n for some A, B
用返initial conditions c_0 = 1, c_1 = 7
可以solve到A = 6/5, B = -1/5

suppose唔expect你識spectral decomposition or even eigenvalues
你其實可以直接搵到c_n既recurrence relation by double counting:
Let c_n做number of strings of length n satisfying the constraints
你可以count入面有幾多個係end with a/b/c
個數係c_n - 4c_{n-1} (因為end with 0/1/2/3既數目都係exactly c_{n-1})
而家用另一個方法去count end with a/b/c既總數, 如果end with a/b/c, 咁second last digit可以係a/b/c或者0/3:
case 1. second last digit係a/b/c既話頭n-1個digit可以睇做length n-1 and end with a/b/c既總數, which is c_{n-1}-4c_{n-2}, 而每個end with a/b/c既length n-1 string你都可以加a/b/c係尾, 所以呢個case既總數係3(c_{n-1)-4c_{n-2})
case 2. second last digit係0/3, 咁頭n-2個digit可以睇做length n-2個case (唔需要理end with咩digit), 而每個case你可以加(0/3, a/b/c) 6個入面是但一個組合係尾, 所以呢個case既總數係6c_{n-2}
兩個case加埋, length n and end with a/b/c既數目係3(c_{n-1}-4c_{n-2})+6c_{n-1}
咁你就有equation:
c_n-4c_{n-1} = 3(c_{n-1}-4c_{n-2}) + 2c_{n-1} = 3c_{n-1}-6c_{n-2}
=> c_n = 7c_{n-1} - 6c_{n-2}
所以你只需要識點solve homogeneous linear recurrence relation就可以solve到個closed-form formula
